subject: Football (College)
Scholarships and Fellowships
lead_paragraph: When Muschamp left Florida to be the defensive coordinator at Auburn, it changed the recruiting dynamic and left the Gators’ new coach to fill his first class with a late start.
snippet: When Muschamp left Florida to be the defensive coordinator at Auburn, it changed the recruiting dynamic and left the Gators’ new coach to fill his first class with a late start.
